title: MAC-Whitelist Enforcement
description:
The MAC ACL reset left the shop open to any device.

Objective: Restore the MAC whitelist on the real AP and verify unauthorized MACs cannot connect.
dialogue: Mira: "Our whitelist got wiped! Now anyone can join the network. We must restore the whitelist to keep malware out."
Mira: "Can you help me reapply the MAC ACL list and check that only approved devices can connect?"
